title: Fred Lawrence Feldman - Israel (retail).epub
description:
Epic in scope, rich in history, ISRAEL is a vivid and searing portrait of historical Palestine and America. This powerful and compelling saga tells the story of two Jewish families caught in the tide of history, with all the drama, passion, love, valor and daring of an enduring dream Ã¢â‚¬â€œ the founding of the state of ISRAEL.

Rebecca Horodetzky Ã¢â‚¬â€œ DannyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s sister had everything Ã¢â‚¬â€œ wealth, fame and power. Her world seemed secure... until a handsome and charismatic Zionist came into her life.

Herschel Kol Ã¢â‚¬â€œ He would never forget Ã¢â‚¬â€œ or forgive Ã¢â‚¬â€œ the young Arab who had taken his fatherÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s life. But the cause he served would demand more than vengeance.

Encompassing a vast canvas of interwoven locales, characters and stories, ISRAEL is the monumental tale of the men and women who fought to make the Jewish Homeland a reality.

Fred Lawrence Feldman is a published fiction and non-fiction author. He lives in Massachusetts, north of Boston.
